channel.title: Post your best your momma jokes
channel.description: POst your best Yo momma jokes ;D No spam please=] I'll report to bebemycat2 If anyone spams ;D thanks dont spam. i got one your momma's so stupid she once attempted to commit suicide by jumping off a Kerb. LOL

item.title: Post your best your momma jokes
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:7, topic:109484”]Yo mama so stupid it took her 2 hours to watch 60 minutes

Yo mama so stupid she asked you “What is the number for 911”

Yo mama so fat people jog around her for exercise

cough Daycrawler,
Moparscape.org *cough[/quote]
you missed the joke.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your best your momma jokes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

The parked car is old

The locked in the 24 hour shop reminded me of

Your mom is so stupid, she starved to death from getting locked up in a grocery store

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:12, topic:109484”]haha, i liked the “Your mum is so old jokes”, great post

Your mum is so dumb she got run over by a parked car

Your mum is so dumb she sat on the floor and fell off[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:4, topic:109484”][size=12pt]Yo’ momma so stupid she went to moparscape.com
Yo’ momma so stupid she posted a question about private servers on moparisthebest.com[/size]
I win.[/quote]

Thats what you did when you first came here.

Yo mamma is so stupid, she tried to drown a fish.

item.title: Post your best your momma jokes
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_kyle pk3r kyle
item.description:
@pk3r_kyle wrote:

Your mum!!

Your mum is so fat when her beeper goes off, people thought she was backing up

Your mum is so fat her nickname is “Lardo”

Your mum is so fat she has her own zipcode!

your mum is so fat that wen she volenteerd at the zoo every1 sed look at that hippopotamus.

Your mum is so fat she eats Wheat Thicks.

Your mum is so fat were in her right now

Your mum is so fat people jog around her for exercise

Your mum is so fat she went to the movies and sat next to everyone

Your mum is so fat she has been declared a natural habitat for Condors

Yo mamma so fat you haveta roll over twice to get off her…

Your mum is so fat she was floating in the ocean and spain claimed her for then new world

Your mum is so fat she lay on the beach and people run around yelling Free Willy

Your mum is so fat when you get on top of her your ears pop!

Your mum is so fat when she has wants someone to shake her hand, she has to give directions!

Your mum is so fat she goes to a resturant, looks at the menu and says “okay!”

Your mum is so fat when she wears a yellow raincoat, people said “Taxi!”

Your mum is so fat she had to go to Sea World to get baptized

Your mum is so fat she got to iron her pants on the driveway

Your mum is so fat she put on her lipstick with a paint-roller

Your mum is so fat she got to pull down her pants to get into her pockets

Your mum is so fat when she tripped over on 4th Ave, she landed on 12th

Your mum is so fat when she bungee jumps, she brings down the bridge too

Your mum is so fat the highway patrol made her wear “Caution! Wide Turn”

Your mum is so fat when she sits around the house, she SITS AROUND THE HOUSE!

Your mum is so fat when she steps on a scale, it read “one at a time, please”

Your mum is so fat when she sits on my face I can’t hear the stereo.

Your mum is so fat she fell in love and broke it.

Your mum is so fat when she gets on the scale it says to be continued.

Your mum is so fat when she gets on the scale it says we don’t do livestock.

Your mum is so fat her neck looks like a pair of hot dogs!

Your mum is so fat she’s got her own area code!

Your mum is so fat she looks like she’s smuggling a Volkswagon!

Your mum is so fat God couldn’t light Earth until she moved!

Your mum is so fat NASA has to orbit a satellite around her!

Your mum is so fat whenever she goes to the beach the tide comes in!

Your mum is so fat when she plays hopscotch, she goes: New York, L.A., Chicago…

Your mum is so fat she’s got Amtrak written on her leg.

Your mum is so fat even Bill Gates couldn’t pay for her liposuction!

Your mum is so fat her legs is like spoiled milk - white & chunky!

Your mum is so fat I had to take a train and five buses just to get on the her good side!

Your mum is so fat she wakes up in sections!

Your mum is so fat when she goes to an amusement park, people try to ride HER!

Your mum is so fat she sat on a quarter and a booger shot out of george washington’s nose.

Your mum is so fat she rolled over 4 quarters and it made a dollar!

Your mum is so fat when she lies on the beach no one else gets sun!

Your mum is so fat when she bunje jumps she goes straight to hell!

Your mum is so fat when she jumps up in the air she gets stuck!!!

Your mum is so fat she’s got more Chins than a Hong Kong phone book!

Your mum is so fat that her senior pictures had to be arial views!

Your mum is so fat she’s on both sides of the family!

Your mum is so fat everytime she walks in high heels, she strikes oil!

Your mum is so fat she fell and made the Grand Canyon!

Your mum is so fat she sat on the beach and Greenpeace threw her in!

Your mum is so fat even her clothes have stretch marks!

Your mum is so fat she has a wooden leg with a kickstand!

Your mum is so fat she has to use a VCR as a beeper!

Your mum is so fat she broke her leg, and gravy poured out!

Your mum is so fat when she rides in a hot air balloon, it looks like she’s wearin tights!

Your mum is so fat she got hit by a parked car!

Your mum is so fat they have to grease the bath tub to get her out!

Your mum is so fat she has a run in her blue-jeans!

Your mum is so fat when she gets on the scale it says to be continued.

Your mum is so fat when she wears a yellow raincoat people say “Taxi!”

Your mum is so fat she got to iron her pants on the driveway!

Your mum is so fat she put on her lipstick with a paint-roller!

Your mum is so fat when she tripped over on 4th Ave she landed on 12th

Your mum is so fat when she bungee jumps she pulls down the bridge too

Your mum is so fat she steps on a scale & it goes one at a time please

Your mum is so fat she fell in love and broke it!

Your mum is so fat she jumped up in the air and got stuck!

Your mum is so fat she fell in love and broke it.

Your mum is so fat when she sits on my face I can’t hear the stereo.

Your mum is so fat they use the elastic in her underwear for bungee jumping

Your mum is so fat when they used her underwear elastic for bungee jumping, they hit the ground.

Your mum is so fat when she back up she beep.

Your mum is so fat she jumped up in the air and got stuck.

Your mum is so fat she has to buy two airline tickets.

Your mum is so fat when she fell over she rocked herself asleep trying to get up again.

Your mum is so fat she influences the tides.

Your mum is so fat that when I tried to drive around her I ran out of gas.

Your mum is so fat she broke her leg and gravy fell out.

Your mum is so fat the animals at the zoo feed her.

Your mum is so fat she was baptized at Marine World.

Your mum is so fat she’s on both sides of the family!

Your mum is so fat when she dances at a concert the whole band skips.

Your mum is so fat the Aids quilt wouldn’t cover her

Your mum is so fat she stands in two time zones.

Your mum is so fat I tried to drive around her and I ran out of gas.

Your mum is so fat she left the house in high heels and when she came back she had on flip flops.

Your mum is so fat shes on both sides of the family

Your mum is so fat you have to grease the door frame and hold a twinkie on the other side just to get her through

Your mum is so fat when she goes to an all you can eat buffet, they have to install speed bumps.

Your mum is so fat that she cant tie her own shoes.

Your mum is so fat sets off car alarms when she runs.

Your mum is so fat she cant reach her back pocket.

Your mum is so fat when she wears one of those X jackets, helicopters try to land on her back!

Your mum is so fat her college graduation picture was an airial.

Your mum is so fat she lays on the beach and greenpeace tried to push her back in the water

Your mum is so fat she broke her leg and gravy poured out

Your mum is so fat she uses redwoods to pick her teeth

Your mum is so fat the only pictures you have of her are satellite pictures

Your mum is so fat she jumped in the air and got stuck.

Your mum is so fat she put on some BVD’s and by the time they reached her waist they spelled out boulevard.

Your mum is so fat she sat on a dollar and squeezed a booger out George Washington’s nose.

Your mum is so fat she stepped on a rainbow and made Skittles.

Your mum is so fat she uses a mattress for a tampon.

Your mum is so fat that when she sits on the beach, Greenpeace shows up and tries to tow her back into the ocean…

Your mum is so fat that she would have been in E.T., but when she rode the bike across the moon, she caused an eclipse.

Your mum is so fat she hoola-hooped the super bowl.

Your mum is so fat she was baptised in the ocean.

Your mum is so fat she has to iron her clothes in the driveway.

Your mum is so fat they tie a rope around her shoulders and drag her through a tunnel when they want to clean it.

Your mum is so fat when she got hit by a bus, she said, “Who threw that rock?”

Your mum is so fat when she stands in a left-turn lane it gives her the green arrow!

Your mum is so fat that when whe was born, she gave the hospital stretch marks.

Your mum is so fat we went to the drive-in and didn’t have to pay because we dressed her as a Chevrolet.

Your mum is so nasty she made speed stick slow down.

Your mum is so nasty she brings crabs to the beach.

Your mum is so nasty she made right guard turn left.

Your mum is so nasty the fishery be paying her to leave

Your mum is so nasty she has to creep up on bathwater.

Your mum is so nasty that pours salt water down her pants to keep her crabs fresh.

Your mum is so nasty I called her to say hello, and she ended up giving me an ear infection.

Your mum is so stupid it took her 2 hours to watch 60 minutes

Your mum is so stupid when she saw the NC-17 (under 17 not admitted) sign, she went home and got 16 friends

Your mum is so stupid when your dad said it was chilly outside, she ran outside with a spoon

Your mum is so stupid she told everyone that she was “illegitiment” because she couldn’t read

Your mum is so stupid that she puts lipstick on her head just to make-up her mind

Your mum is so stupid she hears it’s chilly outside so she gets a bowl

Your mum is so stupid you have to dig for her IQ!

Your mum is so stupid she got locked in a grocery store and starved!

Your mum is so stupid that she tried to put M&M’s in alphabetical order!

Your mum is so stupid she could trip over a cordless phone!

Your mum is so stupid she sold her car for gasoline money!

Your mum is so stupid she bought a solar-powered flashlight!

Your mum is so stupid she thinks a quarterback is a refund!

Your mum is so stupid she took a cup to see Juice.

Your mum is so stupid that she sold the car for gas money.

Your mum is so stupid she asked you “What is the number for 911”

Your mum is so stupid she took a ruler to bed to see how long she slept.

Your mum is so stupid when she read on her job application to not write below the dotted line she put “O.K.”

Your mum is so stupid she got stabbed in a shoot out.

Your mum is so stupid she stole free bread.

Your mum is so stupid she took a spoon to the superbowl.

Your mum is so stupid she called Dan Quayle for a spell check.

Your mum is so stupid she stepped on a crack and broke her own back.

Your mum is so stupid she makes Beavis and Butt-Head look like Nobel Prize winners.

your mum so stupid she hoola-hoops with her wedding ring.

Your mum is so stupid she thought she needed a token to get on Soul Train.

Your mum is so stupid she took the Pepsi challenge and chose Jif.

Your mum is so stupid when you stand next to her you hear the ocean!

Your mum is so stupid she hears it’s chilly outside so she gets a bowl

Your mum is so stupid she got locked in a grocery store and starved!

Your mum is so stupid she thinks Fleetwood Mac is a new hamburger at McDonalds!

Your mum is so stupid she sits on the TV, and watches the couch!

Your mum is so stupid that she thought Boyz II Men was a day care center.

Your mum is so stupid she bought a videocamera to record cable tv shows at home.

Your mum is so stupid when she went to take the 44 bus, she took the 22 twice instead.

Your mum is so stupid she jumped out the window and went up.

Your mum is so stupid she thought a quarterback was an income tax refund.

Your mum is so stupid she took a umbrella to see Purple Rain.

Your mum is so stupid that under “Education” on her job apllication, she put “Hooked on Phonics.”

Your mum is so stupid she put out the cigarette butt that was heating your house.

Your mum is so stupid she put lipstick on her forehead, talking about she was trying to makeup her mind.

Your mum is so stupid she watches “The Three Stooges” and takes notes.

Your mum is so ugly when she joined an ugly contest, they said “Sorry, no professionals.”

Your mum is so ugly she looks out the window and got arrested for mooning.

Your mum is so ugly just after she was born, her mother said “What a treasure!” and her father said “Yes, let’s go bury it.”

Your mum is so ugly they push her face into dough to make gorilla cookies.

Your mum is so ugly they filmed “Gorillas in the Mist” in her shower

Your mum is so ugly they didn’t give her a costume when she tried out for Star Wars.

Your mum is so ugly instead of putting the bungee cord around her ankle, they put it around her neck

Your mum is so ugly she gets 364 extra days to dress up for Halloween.

Your mum is so ugly when she walks into a bank, they turn off the surveillence cameras

Your mum is so ugly her mom had to be drunk to breast feed her

Your mum is so ugly her mom had to tie a steak around her neck to get the dogs to play with her.

Your mum is so ugly when she walks down the street in September, people say “Wow, is it Halloween already?”

Your mum is so ugly the government moved Halloween to her birthday.

Your mum is so ugly that if ugly were bricks she’d have her own projects.

Your mum is so ugly they pay her to put her clothes on in strip joints.

Your mum is so ugly she made an onion cry.

Your mum is so ugly they filmed “Gorillas in the Mist” in her shower!

Your mum is so ugly when they took her to the beautician it took 12 hours. . .for a quote!

Your mum is so ugly they put her in dough and made monster cookies!

Your mum is so ugly she tried to take a bath the water jumped out!

Your mum is so ugly she looks out the window and gets arrested!

Your mum is so ugly even Rice Krispies won’t talk to her!

Your mum is so ugly Ted Dansen wouldn’t date her!

Your mum is so ugly for Halloween she trick or treats on the phone!

Your mum is so ugly she turned Medusa to stone!

Your mum is so ugly The NHL banned her for life

Your mum is so ugly she gets 364 extra days to dress up for Halloween!

Your mum is so ugly the government moved Halloween to her birthday!

Your mum is so ugly if ugly were bricks she’d have her own projects!

Your mum is so ugly they pay her to put her clothes on in strip joints

Your mum is so ugly she made an onion cry!

Your mum is so ugly people go as her for Halloween.

Your mum is so ugly that when she sits in the sand on the beach, cats try to bury her.

Your mum is so ugly she scares the roaches away.

Your mum is so ugly we have to tie a steak around your neck so the dog will play with her!

Your mum is so ugly I heard that your dad first met her at the pound.

Your mum is so ugly that if ugly were bricks she’d have her own projects.

Your mum is so ugly that your father takes her to work with him so that he doesn’t have to kiss her goodbye.

Your mum is so greasy she used bacon as a band-aid!

Your mum is so greasy she sweats Crisco!

Your mum is so greasy Texaco buys Oil from her

Your mum is so old I told her to act her own age, and she died.

Your mum is so old her social security number is 1!

Your mum is so old that when she was in school there was no history class.

Your mum is so old she has a picture of Moses in her yearbook.

Your mum is so old her birth certificate says expired on it.

Your mum is so old she knew Burger King while he was still a prince.

Your mum is so old she was a waitress at the Last Supper.

Your mum is so old she ran track with dinosaurs.

Your mum is so old her birth certificate is in Roman numerals.

Your mum is so old she sat next to jesus in class.

Your mum is so old she has a picture of Moses in her yearbook.

Your mum has one leg and a bicycle.

Your mum has 4 eyes and 2 pair of sunglasses.

Your mum has so much hair on her upper lip, she braids it.

Your mum has one hand and a Clapper.

Your mum has green hair and thinks she’s a tree.

Your mum has one ear and has to take off her hat to hear what you’re saying.

Your mum has 10 fingers–all on the same hand.

Your mum has a glass eye with a fish in it.

Your mum has a short leg and walks in circles.

Your mum has a short arm and can’t applaude.

Your mum has so many freckles she looks like a hamburger!

Your mum has three fingers and a banjo.

Your mum has a wooden leg with a kickstand on it.

Your mum has a bald head with a part and sideburns.

Your mum has a wooden leg with branches.

Your mum has so many teeth missing, it looks like her tounge is in jail.

Your mum is so dirty she has to creep up on bathwater.

Your mum is so dirty she makes mud look clean.

Your mum is so dirty that she was banned from a sewage facility because of sanitation worries!

Your mum is so dirty that you can’t tell where the dirt stops and she begins

Your mum is so skinny she hula hoops with a cheerio

you mum is so skinny she hoola-hoops with her wedding ring.

Your mum is so skinny she has to wear a belt with spandex.

Your mum is so skinny she turned sideways and dissapeared.

Your mum is so lazy she thinks a two-income family is where yo daddy has two jobs.

Your mum is so lazy she’s got a remote control just to operate her remote!

Your mum is so lazy that she came in last place in a recent snail marathon.

Your mum is so poor when I saw her kicking a can down the street, I asked her what she was doing, she said “Moving.”

Your mum is so poor she can’t afford to pay attention!

Your mum is so poor when I ring the doorbell I hear the toilet flush!

Your mum is so poor when she goes to KFC, she has to lick other people’s fingers!

Your mum is so poor when I ring the doorbell she says,“DING!”

Your mum is so poor she went to McDonald’s and put a milkshake on layaway.

Your mum is so poor your family ate cereal with a fork to save milk.

Your mum is so poor her face is on the front of a foodstamp.

Your mum is so poor she was in K-Mart with a box of Hefty bags. I said, “What ya doin’?” She said, “Buying luggage.”

Your mum is so poor she drives a peanut.

Your mum is so poor she waves around a popsicle stick and calls it air conditioning.

Your mum is so tall she tripped over a rock and hit her head on the moon.

Your mum is so tall she tripped in Michigan and hit her head in Florida.

Your mum is so tall she did a cart-wheal and kicked god in the teeth.

Your mum is so bald even a wig wouldn’t help!

Your mum is so bald you can see whats on her mind

Your mum is so bald that she took a shower and got brain-washed.

Your mum is so hairy you almost died of rugburn at birth!

Your mum is so hairy she look like she got Buchwheat in a headlock.

Your mum is so hairy Bigfoot is taking her picture!

Your mum is so hairy she wears a Nike tag on her weave so now everybody calls her Hair Jordan.

Your mum is so short she poses for trophies!

Your mum is so short you can see her feet on her drivers lisence!

Your mum is so short she has to use a ladder to pick up a dime.

Your mum is so short she can play handball on the curb.

Your mum is so short she does backflips under the bed.

Your mum is so short she models for trophys.

Your mum is so flat she’s jealous of the wall!

Your mum is so flat she’s jealous of a book!

Your mum is so flat she’s jealous of a piece of paper!

Jack fell down the hill and it turns out the hill was your mama.

Your mama is so poor, her car’s value changes with the amount of gas in it.
